title: What's Ahead for Defined-Benefit Pension Plans?
description: Russell Kamp, managing director of Ryan ALM, talks to MarketWatch reporter Eleanor Laise about the government's attempt to rescue some underfunded pension plans and other issues on the horizon for plan participants.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Russell Kamp, managing director of Ryan ALM, talks to MarketWatch reporter Eleanor Laise about the government's attempt to rescue some underfunded pension plans and other issues on the horizon for plan participants.
